title: Painting Beautiful Skin Tones with Color & Light
description:
Painting Beautiful Skin Tones with Color & Light by Chris Saper

Overview: You can paint realistic skin tones that glow with life!

Learning how to capture such quality has never been easier. Inside you'll find guidelines for rendering accurate skin tones in a variety of media, including watercolor, oil and pastel.

You'll begin with a review of the five essential painting elements (drawing, value, color, composition and edges), then learn how light and color influence the appearance of skin tones. Artist Chris Saper provides the advice and examples that make every lesson and technique easy to understandÃ¢â‚¬â€immediately improving the quality of your work
